official-title.#text:
To allow for a contract for operation of Melville Hall at the United States Merchant Marine
			 Academy, after receipt of a gift from the United States Merchant Marine
			 Academy Alumni Association and Foundation, Inc., for renovation of such
			 hall and for other purposes.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: U.S. Merchant Marine Academy Improvement Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: U.S. Merchant Marine Academy Improvement Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Melville Hall of United States Merchant Marine Academy

, for the purpose of renovating Melville Hall

section 51315 of

header.#text: Gift to the Merchant Marine Academy

text.#text: A gift described in this subsection is a gift under subsection (a) that the

the minimum amount that is sufficient to ensure the renovation of Melville Hall in accordance with

25 percent of the amount described in paragraph (1).

accepts a gift of money

text.#text: The contract described in subsection (c) shall be for such period and on such terms as the

at the expense solely of the Foundation through the term of the contract to maintain Melville Hall

the date that the renovation of Melville Hall was completed; or
the date that the Foundation accepted Melville Hall after it was tendered to the Foundation by the

to deposit all proceeds from the operation of Melville Hall, after expenses necessary for the

prohibits the use of Melville Hall as lodging or an office by any person for more than 4 days in

for the administration and operation of Melville Hall.

to award a contract for the operation
